title: What going to business school did for me
excerpt: As my first year at Yale SOM wound down, I felt alone. I knew I didn't want to be a consultant or a banker. I didn't feel like I fit in. But quitting now? Nuh-uh.

title: Sunsetting Google Plus

title: What bicycling across the United States taught me about software engineering
